text: My journey in web development began in 2022 when I began studying HTML, CSS and Javascript. Once I had grasped the basics, I transitioned to a React-based workflow.
React appealed to me due to its highly-structured yet robust nature and the ease with which highly-responsive UIs can be generated.

After creating a few front-end projects in React, I ventured into full-stack territory with MERN (MongoDB, Express, React and node.js). My MovieReviewBlogger project showcases my proficiency in these technologies.
Aside from React, I have also taken on some freelance work as a Wordpress developer, with proficiencies in PHP and custom theme/plugin development.
